system.description: This spell functions like interposing hand, except the hand can also grapple one opponent you select, with one grapple attack per round. The hand holds but does not harm grappled creatures. It can also bull rush as forceful hand (+16 on Strength check) or interpose as interposing hand. Directing the spell to a new target is a move action. Attack bonus: caster level + Int/Wis/Cha mod + 10 (Str 31) - 1 (Large). Grapple bonus: same with +4 for Large instead of -1.

components.materialDescription: A leather glove (arcane focus); divine focus (divine).
